pages.title: Raffia
pages.text: Raffia is a palm fibre, that is used to make baskets and other similar stuff, as well as a fuel.Raffia is crafted from any palm log and a stone knife.

pages.title: Liber
pages.text: Liber is tree bark fibre, that is used to make baskets and other similar stuff, as well as a fuel.Liber is crafted from linden or birch log and a stone knife.
